talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Manager Maisa${sound:npc_Meissa_qu9929_sp_07.ogg}
You heard me. This is the latest news, hot off the presses. Domineering Nephrite was defeated by Bewitching Hiver.
So… I don't know why you were asking about Hiver, but you better steer clear of her if you want to live.

${user_nick}$
…………………………………………………

${user_nick}$
…………………………………………………

$Child Hiver$
…………………………………………………

$Hologram Norfe$
…………………………………………………

${user_nick}$
That's perfect. I can just put the box here.

${user_nick}$
All right, I'll be careful.
(I've heard all there is to know. Time to head to the Red Waste.)

${user_nick}$
(Though it is sealed, a little force could open it quite easily.)

${user_nick}$
Okay, insert the knife blade here and... There we go!

$Box$
(The seal broke easily, and you can see inside the box. It contains a small jewel, a Communication Stone, and instructions.)

${user_nick}$
A jewel? Wait, this is just like with the Blue Clan…

${user_nick}$
Hang on, I should read the instructions first. If this is like the Blue Clan, it will say to leave the box and escape.

${user_nick}$
'Call her name into the Communication Stone.'
… Really? Call Hiver here with this?

${user_nick}$
Hiver…?

${user_nick}$
(No response. Should I try again?)

${user_nick}$
(Well... This isn't just some useless rock; it's a Communication Stone...
If Hiver doesn't appear after me calling her, she must be…)

${user_nick}$
(Then again, knowing her personality,
Hiver wouldn't just appear as soon as she's called by some stranger. In that case...)

${user_nick}$
(A normal person would just ask for a name, but it seems I'll have to let her know who's calling.)

${user_nick}$
(Speaks into the Communication Stone with a loud, clear voice.)
Child Hiver of the Western Territory, Commander Hwaran of the Southern Territory is looking for you.

${user_nick}$
I have no intention of fighting you. I am simply an errand runner. I came with a message from Hwaran.
So please, come out of hiding and show yourself.

${user_nick}$
Hey? Helloooo? Are you listening, Hiver?!

$Child Hiver${action:Talk}{sound:npc_Childhiver_qu9930_sp_01.ogg}
Quiet, worm. How dare you speak my name so carelessly? Are you not afraid to die?

${user_nick}$
(Is this girl Hiver? Well… She does resemble Grele. Though her expression is quite different.)
If you'd come out earlier I wouldn't have had to shout. Now my voice hurts.

$Child Hiver$
Where did you get the Communication Stone? And what is this about the commander?

${user_nick}$
Right down to business, huh? Here, don't you see the Red Lotus Palace seal on this box?
I came here by order of Southern Territory Commander Hwaran. She gave me the Communication Stone.

$Child Hiver$
You expect me to believe that?

${user_nick}$
Believe what you will. I've done what I came to do.

$Child Hiver$
(Squints and looks at you.)
Fine, what is it the commander wants of me?

${user_nick}$
I dunno. I was simply ordered to deliver the box and a message.
How the heck am I supposed to know what Hwaran wants? Here, read the letter.

$Child Hiver$
Hmm… This is quite unexpected.
(Hiver flashes a smile while going over the letter, then reads the last part out loud.)

$Child Hiver$
"The bearer of this message is called {user_nick}, a skilled fighter who you may use at your discretion.
When the sandstorm subsides, let's share a cup of warm tea in the Julian Pavilion."…
Oh my... Does she really think I'm that gullible?

${user_nick}$
Haha, what do you mean, "gullible?"

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Does that mean you refuse? In that case I will return with your response.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Child Hiver$
Why would the commander of the rich South pay attention to a barren land like the Western Territory?
She must have had a lot of trouble with Jade before, so she's trying to make me a puppet when I'm at my most vulnerable.

$Child Hiver$
Well, it doesn't matter. I'm glad she's helping me!
Tell her I'm deeply grateful for her assistance. This actually fits nicely with my plans.

$Child Hiver$
For now, go to Rhadames and wait for your next command.
I assume you aren't foolish enough to go around saying my name there, correct?

${user_nick}$
(Damn... They say she was once part of the Anti-Goddess Faction… So just how much does she know about Rhadames?)
… Rha-... *Coughs*... -dames? Where's that?

$Child Hiver$
What are you, some kind of meathead? You really don't know Rhadames?
Would someone Hwaran said was useful really be that ignorant?

${user_nick}$
(I have a bad feeling about this. I better plead ignorance.)
That's a new one for me. I'm not that familiar with this region, you know.

$Child Hiver$
It's the base of the Anti-Goddess Faction. You might call it a well-hidden bug nest.
I'll mark it down on this map. Go there and wait for your instructions.
Oh, and it might be easiest to pretend you're one of the refugees. The place is teeming with them, after all.

${user_nick}$
(Yikes... This is the exact location of Rhadames.)
The hideout of the Anti-Goddess Faction? Why are you just leaving it be? Isn't this part of the Southern Territory?

$Child Hiver$
What are you talking about? It's too much to raid alone and there's nothing to gain.
They've got their own defense plans. Besides, things get complicated when other Childs are involved.
It would only be playing into the hands of the others.

$Child Hiver$
I intend to deal with them in due time, but for now it won't hurt to leave them be.
So go there and stay put for the time being. Keep your eye out for the one they call 'Norfe' in particular. That's the leader of the worms who stays in hiding and only appears in public through a hologram.

$Child Hiver$
It would be even better if you could determine the actual location of that geezer.
The Goddess will be pleased if I present Norfe's head on a platter. That means it's a good thing for you and me too.

${user_nick}$
(Well then… She knows far too much.)

$Child Hiver${sound:npc_Childhiver_qu9930_sp_02.ogg}
… There's also someone there named 'Grele'.
He has the same colored hair as me… The mutant Child.

${user_nick}$
(Better play dumb.)
Grele? What does that mean, "mutant?" Same colored hair, you say? Does that mean you're related?

$Child Hiver${sound:npc_Childhiver_qu9930_sp_03.ogg}
That's none of your concern. But if you see him, kill him.
You'll get bonus points if you bring me his jewel. Hehehe…

${user_nick}$
(Damn, she's ruthless.)

${user_nick}$
Alrighty, I'll wait for you to get in touch.
(This is bad… Not only does Hiver know about Rhadames, she remembers everything about its people?)

$Manager Maisa${action:Talk}
Oh, are you here for more work? I actually assigned a mission to someone else just now, unfortunately.

${user_nick}$
No, not work. It's about that matter we discussed earlier.
Well, I guess you could say I have another question.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'll issue you a <FONT color=#a82424>20% discount coupon</FONT>.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Manager Maisa$
Well, I'd be happy to tell you what I know.
Can I take a cut from your next pay in return?

$Manager Maisa$
Haha, I'm only kidding! Ask away.

${user_nick}$
About Hiver. Do you think… she might know the location of Rhadames?

$Manager Maisa$
Well… She didn't know originally. Not all Anti-Goddess Faction members know the location of the main base.
Then again, she did come here near the end, so maybe she does remember?

${user_nick}$
Amazing... A Child knows the location of your base, yet you guys are chilling here as if nothing's wrong?
(Vernicka has reason to want to do away with her.)

$Manager Maisa$
The scramble for jewels is raging in the West, so she lacks the resources to attack us. And we're no concern for her; the South as a whole is barely keeping its head above water as it is.
Besides, everything's been fine so far, right?

${user_nick}$
It seems to me the Anti-Goddess Faction simply doesn't have a plan…

$Manager Maisa${sound:npc_Meissa_qu9930_sp_01.ogg}
Norfe will have thought of something.
Anyway, it has only been very recently that Hiver emerged as a power-player. She wasn't on the radar before.

${user_nick}$
Does that matter? You could have told another more powerful Child about her.

$Manager Maisa$
Okay, do you think that Child would just give us a reward in return or something?
Would they just pat us on the head and thank us for giving such good information?
Instead, they would suspect Hiver and kill her, or just use the information and absorb her with no benefit to us.

${user_nick}$
Haha… Fair enough. Childs are like that.

$Manager Maisa$
Hiver's the one who would be in the most danger if the other Childs became aware that she knows our location.
At the very least, they would torture her to death to learn the truth. Only then would they be able to attack. So we're safe for now.
Anyway… Why are you so worried about this?

${user_nick}$
Huh? (Uh... Yeah, why should I care?)

$Manager Maisa$
You're a mercenary. Isn't your sole purpose to do a job, get paid, and move on?
It's a bit odd seeing you take so much interest in Hiver and the safety of Rhadames.
Is there something wrong?

${user_nick}$
Come on, I saw firsthand what happened with the Blue Clan. This place is a good source of work for me. I don't want to see the same thing happen here that happened in the
Blue Raven Territory.

$Manager Maisa$
Hmm... Well, if you're truly worried, you should go see Norfe.
If it's about the safety of Rhadames, he may be willing to meet you.

${user_nick}$
(Hmm… Should I? I better give this some thought.)
All right, I'll be going for now.

${user_nick}$
(Indeed... Why do I even care…?
It's hard enough looking after myself in this bloody world, so what good can I do?

${user_nick}$
(I should just carry out missions and get paid... That's right.
Just doing missions and getting my money is already hard enough...
Why would I risk it all for the sake of Rhadames?)

${user_nick}$
(… Because of the Blue Clan? Because of the Blue Raven Territory?
No, that kind of thing happens all the time. It's not the first time I've seen people get hurt and die...

${user_nick}$
(That's how the world is. This isn't my first war.
People died fighting the Monolith. People kill to survive, myself included.
A Child is probably killing someone at this very moment.)

${user_nick}$
(… It's just... The world's that kind of place... I know too well, and I've had enough of it.)

${user_nick}$
Why am I so... anxious?

${user_nick}$
(I need… to calm down. I can't let my emotions do the thinking for me.
First of all, Kyle told me to help those Anti-Goddess Faction guys find the Cup of Healing.
I haven't heard from him for a while, but yes, if he wanted the Cup of Healing to come here... There must have been a reason.)

${user_nick}$
(So Kyle wouldn't want this place to collapse right now, would he? It must serve some purpose.
That's the only logical conclusion.)

${user_nick}$
(Moreover… if Rhadames were to fall, Merca would inevitably be affected.
Even if I focused on protecting Merca, it would be a bad thing to lose an ally.
There's also the issue of Shalica .)

${user_nick}$
(Hwaran told me to help Hiver, but to Hiver, Shalica is just another Child, which makes her an enemy.
And Shalica was helping the Anti-Goddess Faction... So if something bad happened here, it could end up hurting Shalica as well.)

${user_nick}$
(Right… Kyle's goal, the safety of Merca, the Shalica issue… This is why.
This is why I'm so concerned about Rhadames, and why I want to warn Norfe.)

${user_nick}$
(I'm not necessarily violating Hwaran's order, I'm just…
... I'm just giving some information to make sure Rhadames is okay.
All she told me to do was help Hiver in the struggle between Childs.)

${user_nick}$
(Making sure Rhadames doesn't fall into Hiver's hands is an unrelated side issue.)
All right… Let's go see the old man.

$Hologram Norfe$
Hmm… I haven't seen you in a while. I don't have any jobs for you, so what's this about?

${user_nick}$
I have something to tell you about Hiver. The Hiver who joined your ranks, then became a Child.

$Hologram Norfe$
… Indeed, I had a feeling you would mention her.

${user_nick}$
Quit playing games.
That Child knows exactly where Rhadames is, yet here you are doing nothing in response.

$Hologram Norfe$
Well, I'm merely watching the situation carefully.
Anyway, what's all this to you?

${user_nick}$
It's a long, complicated story. I don't care personally, but let's just say I somehow got tangled up in the matter.

$Hologram Norfe$
So you expect me to trust you based on that? Even you should be able to admit you're asking too much.

${user_nick}$
Would you rather I made up a pretty story to convince you?
Anyway, she says she wants to present the Goddess with your head on a platter. She means to find your base.

$Hologram Norfe$
Anyone who knows the name "Norfe" is aware of that much.

${user_nick}$
She also told me to kill the one named "Grele" if I encounter him.
Understand? It was when she gave me the exact coordinates of Rhadames.
You've been fine so far, but you might not be much longer. That's what I'm trying to say.

$Hologram Norfe${sound:npc_Hologram_Norphee_qu9930_sp_01.ogg}
(The old man looks your way after pondering silently for a time.)
So, are you going to kill me? Me and the girl, I mean?

${user_nick}$
If I were going to do that, you'd be dead already, old man!

$Hologram Norfe${sound:npc_Hologram_Norphee_qu9930_sp_02.ogg}
Well, that's why I'm asking. What is your purpose for telling me this?
What value does good will toward us bring your purse?

${user_nick}$
Well, that's…
Enough questions! I never imagined passing on some information would be so complicated.
It's because I'm heavily indebted.

$Hologram Norfe$
How the heck are you indebted to us?

${user_nick}$
Come to think of it, you're right! I guess I'll be on my way!

${user_nick}$
……?! (Someone is watching me...)

$Boy$
(A wily-looking boy is standing there. Maybe it's because you turned around all of a sudden, but he seems startled.)

${user_nick}$
(… I don't see anyone but this boy...)

$Boy$
{user_nick}? You're {user_nick}, right?

${user_nick}$
Well? What of it?
(Don't tell me it's a message from Hiver.)

$Boy$
Manager Maisa is looking for you.
She said she has a job for {user_nick}. Anyway, see ya.

$Manager Maisa$
Welcome! I have a job for you.
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

journal.title: To the Red Waste
journal.contents:
You finished speaking with Maisa. It's time to go meet Child Hiver. Take the box and Communication Stone Hwaran gave you.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Rhadames (Anti-Goddess Faction Secret Passage) → Red Waste (Suitable Place)

journal.title: The Box is Open, But...
journal.contents:
You found a suitable place to open the box. Time to break the seal. What could be inside the box?
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Rhadames (Anti-Goddess Faction Secret Passage) → Red Waste (Box)
journal.todo_msg: Open the box in the Red Waste.

journal.title: Reason for the No-Show
journal.contents:
You opened the box, but Hiver hasn't appeared. Why not? There must be a reason. Give it some thought.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Rhadames (Anti-Goddess Faction Secret Passage) → Red Waste (Do Some Thinking)
journal.destination: (Solo) Do Some Thinking in Red Waste
journal.todo_msg: Go to the place where you left the box in the Red Waste and do some thinking.

journal.title: She Finally Appears
journal.contents:
Hiver finally appeared in the Red Waste. Give Hiver Hwaran's Message and speak with her.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Rhadames (Anti-Goddess Faction Secret Passage) → Red Waste (Hiver)
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Hiver, who just appeared
journal.todo_msg: Hiver has appeared in the Red Waste. Talk to her.

journal.title: Hidden Danger
journal.contents:
At last, you meet Hiver. After accepting Hwaran's proposal, Hiver tells {user_nick} to go to Rhadames and wait for her to get in touch. A Child sworn to absolute subservience to the Goddess knows the location of Rhadames… Is that possibly okay? After some thought, you determine that it can't not be a problem and decide to warn Rhadames.

Rhadames - Manager Maisa
journal.destination: Talk to Manager Maisa in Rhadames
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Manager Maisa in Rhadames.

journal.title: A Reason to Act
journal.contents:
Maisa says it will be okay, but you are still worried. But come to think of it, what do you care about Rhadames anyway? What is it that is causing you to worry this much?
You better collect your thoughts.

Rhadames - A Quiet Place
journal.destination: Find a Quiet Place to Think
journal.todo_msg: Find a a quiet place in Rhadames to think.

journal.title: I don't know if I should have done that or not, but...
journal.contents:
After pondering the issue from all angles, you conclude that the most efficient thing to do is warn that old man Norfe about Hiver. You can't find a reason not to.

Rhadames - Hologram Norfe
journal.destination: Talk to Hologram Norfe in Rhadames
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Hologram Norfe in Rhadames.

journal.title: Someone's Watching
journal.contents:
You informed Norfe of the danger. You did your part. As you were thinking as much, you felt the eyes of someone watching. Who is it?

Rhadames - ???
journal.todo_msg: Find the person watching you in Rhadames.

journal.title: News
journal.contents:
According to the watching boy, Manager Maisa has some work for you. You better go see what it is this time.

Rhadames - Manager Maisa
journal.destination: Talk to Manager Maisa in Rhadames
journal.todo_msg: Go to Manager Maisa in Rhadames.
